sense.def:
The economy of a country or region
je sistem, po kakršnem so organizirani denarni posli, industrija in gospodarstvo.

seg.quote: New England's economy is still largely based on manufacturing.

sense.def:
Bogastvo, ki ga neka država ali odmočje pridobi s pomočjo poslovanja ali industrije, prav tako imenujemo
its economy
.

seg.quote: Unofficial strikes were damaging the British economy.

sense.def:
Economy
je previdno trošenje ali uporaba stvari, zato da prihranimo denar.

seg.quote: His house was small, for reasons of economy.
